title: Blue Bell Just Brought Back This Limited Edition Ice Cream Flavor and Fans Are Stocking Up for Summer

Nina Derwin is a Brooklyn-based writer with a passion for the art of storytelling. In addition to writing articles for various clients and publications, Nina has written several episodes of scripted television for networks including Starz and Fox.

published about 9 hours ago

We independently select these products‚Äîif you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Summertime and ice cream cones go hand in hand. It‚Äôs one of the few combinations that just about everybody, no matter their age, can agree on: Nothing tastes or feels quite as good as frosty, cold ice cream on a hot summer day.

But, it‚Äôs the discussion around the best ice cream flavor where opinions tend to differ. Everyone has their favorite, the one go-to that they swear by. For a lot of people, that must-have ice cream flavor is Blue Bell‚Äôs Cookie Cake Ice Cream, which has finally returned to grocery stores, just in time to sweeten up your summer nights.

A truly unique and one-of-a-kind creation, Blue Bell‚Äôs Cookie Cake Ice Cream takes everything we already know and love about cookie cakes and turns it into ice cream. The end result? Sweet cream ice cream with lots of chocolate chip cookie cake pieces mixed in with swirls of vanilla and chocolate icing. If it never occurred to you that there might be a way to improve upon the seemingly flawless cookie cake, you‚Äôre not alone ‚Äî but it appears that Blue Bell has done it.

The returning favorite is back in stores for a limited time, and you can scoop it up (pun intended) in pint and half-gallon sizes. Judging by the internet‚Äôs response, it likely won‚Äôt stay on grocery store shelves for long, though.¬†

‚ÄúThis is my number 1 favorite flavor!! Please keep it around for good!!‚Äù wrote one Instagram user on the brand‚Äôs official post announcing the return of the freezer-aisle favorite. ‚ÄúBless these revivals üôåüèº I‚Äôve never had this and ü§§ Stocking my freezer up!‚Äù said another. ‚ÄúCan we get this permanently! Or at least yearly, that‚Äôd be much appreciated,‚Äù wrote another Cookie Cake loving fan.

If you‚Äôve never tried this totally original ice cream flavor, do yourself a favor and bring home a pint or two before it disappears once again.
